data.name: Juggernaut (Zombie)
data.description: Still empowered by the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak while infected with the zombie virus, Cain Marko became an unstoppable, undead Juggernaut capable of dealing massive damage to his enemies.

starItems.name: Juggernaut (Zombie)
starItems.description: Still empowered by the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak while infected with the zombie virus, Cain Marko became an unstoppable, undead Juggernaut capable of dealing massive damage to his enemies.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if the primary target has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, attack the primary target for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of target's Max Health

5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Spread all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from the primary target to the secondary target

6.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.
Spread all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from the primary target to the secondary target.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, attack the primary target for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of target's Max Health.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.

7.description:

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage.
Spread all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from the primary target to the secondary target.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, attack the primary target for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of target's Max Health.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Prolong <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects on each target

1.description:
Spread all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from the primary target to all adjacent targets.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.

This attack cannot be blocked.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Prolong all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on each target.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain

2.description:
Spread all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from the primary target to all adjacent targets.

This attack cannot be blocked.

 > Prolong all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on each target.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

Clear all negative effects on this character. If negative effects removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Spread all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from the primary target to all adjacent targets.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

This attack cannot be blocked.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Prolong all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on each target.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When attacked, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>30%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from self, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, and apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to a random Undead Asgardian ally.

When any <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> ally is summoned or revived, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. On Death, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Revive with <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for each non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> ally, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

<color=#fff568>Stun</color> cannot be applied to this character.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character

<color=#fff568>Stun</color> cannot be applied to this character.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.
2.nextUpgrade:
Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health

When any <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> ally is summoned or revived, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. On Death, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for each non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> ally, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

<color=#fff568>Stun</color> cannot be applied to this character.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>UNDYING</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.
 > If this character's Health is greater or equal to <color=#86e619>50%</color>, lower enemy Resistance by <color=#86e619>75%</color>.
 > If this character's Health is greater or equal to <color=#86e619>50%</color>, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
